descriptiontext: Just a basic Hello World Sample. It reads in the Excel file, causes a rule to fire against the first cell, changing it to 'HelloWorld'. Note that the outputfile is different, we don't overwrite any Excel files.
Reads in the data from the Excel file, causes a rule to fire against each cell. Each cell is logged, and marked as changed
A simple sample, showcasing the use of a Decision Model instead of a rules file
Writing rules in a more english-like language, using a DSL (Domain specific language) to translate into actual rules file
